page.title: Application Overview
page.introduction:
Applications allow users to define the quantitative conditions needed to define, run and visualize a Virtual Experiment, i.e. numerical simulation. The Application is the component in which the mapping between the model and the geometry can be established, define the Specifications (species, reactions) and Protocols (events, electric). When you create an Application, you create either a Deterministic or Stochastic model.
The Application directory displays the Applications associated with the BioModel. You can expand the tree to display the Geometry , Specifications, Protocols, Simulations, Parameter Estimation.
